ReviewStatus.description: A particular stage in a review process
ReviewStatus.label: Status in a review process

SimpleReviewStatus.label: A status for a simple review process containing 6 possible stages

SpecificationTestCase.description: A test case which relates to a requirement set in a specification
SpecificationTestCase.label: A Test Case based on a specification

TestCase.description: A set of test inputs, execution conditions, and expected results developed for a particular objective, such as to exercise a particular program path or to verify compliance with a specific requirement
TestCase.label: A Test Case

expectedResults.description: The results that a conformant implementation is expected to produce when this test is executed
expectedResults.label: expected results

input.description: Parameters or data that are needed for the test execution.
input.label: input

informationResourceInput.description: Information Resource (e.g. a file) used as input for the test case
informationResourceInput.label: information resource as input

informationResourceResults.description: Information Resource (e.g. a file) that contains the expected results for the test case
informationResourceResults.label: information resource as expected results

preCondition.description: a condition that must be met before the test is executed
preCondition.label: precondition

specificationReference.description: a description or a link of what part of which specification lead to the creation of this test case
specificationReference.label: reference in specification
